subject: A Chance to Win a Vacation for Two
body:
A Chance to Win a Vacation for Two




You 
      are receiving this custom newsletter because you signed up to receive 
      theTravel Deals Alert newsletter from Cheapflights.com.



July 2007

















                      Hello Fellow Traveler:
To thank you for being a loyal newsletter subscriber, we want to give you a chance to win a FREE weekend getaway for two. 
In fact, we want to give you as many as five chances to spend a weekend for two anywhere in the United States, compliments of Cheapflights.com.
It's easy. Just click here to visit the entry page for our brand new Weekend Flyaway Sweepstakes. You won't even need to complete an entry form. Just click the Submit button and you'll be automatically entered for the first time. 
You'll also get four more entries just for sharing the first names and email addresses of four friends, family members, neighbors or business associates with us. We'll send them a message inviting them to enter Weekend Flyaway Sweepstakes. This message will have your coded entry link so that you'll get an extra entry for everyone who enters. Plus, we'll send you a separate message to let you know every time one of them enters!
Who knows? With more chances to win, you could be flying away to the weekend trip together. 
Good luck!
Cheapflights.com Travel Deals Newsletter
Sponsor: Cheapflights (USA) Inc., 24 School Street, Boston, MA 02108
